title: Pumpkin and White Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: ['280g plain flour', '1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '225g unsalted butter', '330g dark brown soft sugar', '250g pumpkin puree', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '360g white chocolate chips', '110g chopped pecans']
